      • isOperationPermitted

        boolean isOperationPermitted(Class<? extends org.identityconnectors.framework.api.operations.APIOperation> operation)
                             throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
        Checks the operation permission before execution.
        Parameters:
        operation -
        Returns:
        if denied is true and the onDeny equals org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.openicf.commons.OperationOptionInfoHelper.OnDenyAction#DO_NOTHING returns false else true
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - if denied is true and the onDeny equals org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.openicf.commons.OperationOptionInfoHelper.OnDenyAction#THROW_EXCEPTION
